org.interledger.cryptoconditions

インタフェース Condition

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    Comparable<Condition>
    既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    CompoundCondition, SimpleCondition
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    CompoundSha256Condition, ConditionBase, Ed25519Sha256Condition, PrefixSha256Condition, PreimageSha256Condition, RsaSha256Condition, Sha256Condition, ThresholdSha256Condition

    public interface Condition
extends Comparable<Condition>
    An implementation of a crypto-conditions Condition.
    関連項目:
    "https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-thomas-crypto-conditions/"

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 非推奨のメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      long getCost()
      The estimated "cost" of processing a fulfillment of this condition.
      byte[] getFingerprint()
      非推奨です。 
      String getFingerprintBase64Url()
      A fingerprint is a binary (aka "octet") string uniquely representing the condition with respect to other conditions of the same type.
      CryptoConditionType getType()
      The type identifier representing the condition type.

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getType

        CryptoConditionType getType()
        The type identifier representing the condition type.
        戻り値:
        the type of this condition

      • getFingerprint

        @Deprecated
byte[] getFingerprint()
        非推奨です。 

        A fingerprint is a binary (aka "octet") string uniquely representing the condition with respect to other conditions of the same type. Implementations which index conditions MUST use the entire string or binary encoded condition as the key - not just the fingerprint - as different conditions of different rsa may have the same fingerprint. The length and contents of the fingerprint are defined by the condition type. The fingerprint is a cryptographically secure hash of the data which defines the condition, such as a public key.

        WARNING: This method MUST perform a safe copy of the internal data to protect immutability. Callers should use getFingerprintBase64Url() instead if possible.

        戻り値:
        A read-only byte array that contains the unique fingerprint of this condition.

      • getFingerprintBase64Url

        String getFingerprintBase64Url()

        A fingerprint is a binary (aka "octet") string uniquely representing the condition with respect to other conditions of the same type. Implementations which index conditions MUST use the entire string or binary encoded condition as the key - not just the fingerprint - as different conditions of different rsa may have the same fingerprint. The length and contents of the fingerprint are defined by the condition type. The fingerprint is a cryptographically secure hash of the data which defines the condition, such as a public key.

        戻り値:
        A Base64Url-encoded String that contains the unique fingerprint of this condition.

      • getCost

        long getCost()
        The estimated "cost" of processing a fulfillment of this condition. For details of how to calculate this number see the Crypto-conditions specification.
        戻り値:
        the cost of validating the fulfillment of this condition
